page.title: 01GENERAL DETAILS.
page.content:
{Bentley}is situated at the western edge of the{Southern Weald,}on the border with Surrey, midway between {Alton}and{Farnham.}This block contains the greatest part of the village of Bentley to the North of the{A31,}and on the ancient Pilgrim's Way. There has been continuous settlement here since the Roman Occupation and is now a popular residential location for London commuters causing property prices to be very high.
Part of{Lower Froyle}and the hamlet of {Well}are within the block.
{Population}of the Parish of Bentley in 1983 was 712.
